price: دوى وويل: موږ به يې له پلاره غوښتنه وكړو او خامخا د دې كار كوونكي يو.
arabic: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qālū sanurāwidu ʿanhu abāhu wa-innā lafāʿilūna
translations: We will try to get permission
